results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-6f965f955c-8xhlf

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-6f965f955c-8xhlf], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the pod "wordpress-deployment-6f965f955c-8xhlf" is not ready, though 1 is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify readiness probe settings. 4. Ensure required resources are available.
